testsuite.name: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And There exists a class called "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And There exists a unit called "Unit 1" for class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And There exists a unit called "Unit 2" for class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "As1" in unit "Unit 1" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "As2" in unit "Unit 1" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "Ex1" in unit "Unit 2" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "Ex2" in unit "Unit 2" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: When I change the assignment "As2" in the unit "Unit 1" part of the "TimelineClass" class to start "tomorrow" and end "2 days from today"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I navigate to the assignment editor for "As1" in unit "Unit 1" of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I change the "Start Date" date to "today" in the policy editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I change the "End Date" date to "tomorrow" in the policy editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I change the "Restrict Feedback Until" date to "3 days from today" in the policy editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I save the assignment on the policies page and return to content repository
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "TimelineClass" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I go to the Edit Class Schedule page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I see a timeline is rendered
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I see the following modules "As1,As2" on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I click the unit "Unit 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: When I move the selected modules "forward" one day on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I see the undo button is enabled on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I navigate to the assignment editor for "As1" in unit "Unit 1" of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: Then I see "Start Date" date is set to "tomorrow" in the policy editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I see "End Date" date is set to "2 days from today" in the policy editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I see "Restrict Feedback Until" date is set to "4 days from today" in the policy editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I save the assignment on the policies page and return to content repository
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: And I see the assignment "As2" in the unit "Unit 1" part of the "TimelineClass" class starts "2 days from today" and ends "3 days from today"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test of moving timeline modules save changes
